Reviews.Content: I'm not very experienced with a flat screen of my own, however, I have observed the picture quality of many flat screens in the stores over the years. This TV has an awesome and clear picture quality. The color is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Decent entry level TV - Only 2 HDMI Ports
Reviews.Author: M.L.
Reviews.Content: There is nothing smart about this TV, which is a given for the low budget market this TV is targeted for. The build is simple with no frill.  About 2/3 of the TV is slim but other 1/3 fairly thickThe picture good is good and the sound is surprisingly good. The sound is better then our 55" Toshiba.The blacks are not that great, definitely not true black but more then acceptableBeing 120HZ it can handle most motion without blur.What I do not like about this TV is it only has 2 HDMI ports, while this may be acceptable to some it is not to me.  A TV should have a minimum of 3 this day and age.  If you have a cable box and a blu-ray player, your ports are filled.There is no network port for updating firmware, so are stuck using USB.The remote has a cheap plastic feel to it, This is another common theme with cheaper TV sets.If are in the market for a lower cost TV and only need 2 HDMI ports then this TV should work for.  Personally, I believe you should save an extra $100 to $150 and step up to a better 40" TVI gave 4 stars because to be fair this is a lower cost TV and the picture quality is good but I did take a star away because of there only being 2 HDMI ports

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV Great Price
Reviews.Author: REESE
Reviews.Content: Nice  features,modern Style, only draw back very difficult to find a TV wall mount,  be prepare to use the stand only..

Reviews.Title: Good picture, but false advertising
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: Picture is good for the money and the audio is good enough for me. Would have been a great purchase for me, but falsely advertised to have component video. If it didn't have that listed in the ad, it would have gotten a more appropriate rating. But, companies and sellers of their products have a responsibility. If you don't need component than you're good to go.EDIT: Amazon offered to take the TV back, but I need it for an event. They are refunding me 25%. I think this is quite fair and am happy with their response...did the right thing. I'm changing my rating from 1 star to 3 as a result. Still is being falsely advertised unfortunately. But, I am happy enough with Amazon to continue using their services.

Reviews.Title: Good budget LED LCD but not near Plasma displays.
Reviews.Author: HD Hockey Guy
Reviews.Content: First let me say this is my first LED display but I am familiar with the pros/cons of LCD/LED/PLASMA displays and own a Samsung LCD and Samsung Plasma display as well.  I was looking to replace an RCA 32" 720p LCD display in my computer room which had a decent picture but was a little small for watching hockey games which was my primary purpose for purchasing this TV.After getting it SUPER FAST and in perfect working condition setup was a breeze with only the base to attach and batteries to put in the remote and plug in the connections and boom you're watching tv in no time.  On screen setup was quick and easy (except for the ATSC digital tv channel scan which requires you to visit Westinghouse's website to gain an unlock code to activate the digital tuner for some reason - seems silly to me).I watched a few programs of varying types, sports, movies, bright content, dark content and noticed a couple of things compared to my Samsung displays.Default settings are pretty good for contrast/brightness optimization if you use the Video Presets to select between SHOWROOM, MOVIE, GAME, SPORTS.  Each has their own ups and downs but after tweaking the settings based on what I was watching, I usually only went a few clicks off their start points to find what was pleasing to me.The 3 star rating comes from a few primary reasons;1) Contrast is majorly exaggerated even set to about 30% of max2) Brightness levels will not produce a legit white without graying up the black levels.3) Cable/Satellite content shows it's flaws in spades.I thought LED would be able to produce a little better white while not losing the blacks with a better contrast ability but as soon as you turn up the contrast (or even use the SHOWROOM or SPORTS settings) you get blooming of the bright details and they wash out.  Darks are SO DARK that it looks like everything is muddied.  Turning off DYNAMIC CONTRAST in the Video Options will help this a little, but it still is a problem with this panel display.My 5 year old 50" 720p Plasma display beats the pants off this 40" LED 1080p and just to compare I even hooked up the same content to the 23" LCD to compare and it was far better on contrast/brightness and detail.More downside;- Color reproduction is not "true".  There are 3 color temperature settings and the presets all use a different one. MOVIE uses the warm and over-reddens everything so white becomes pinkish/orange. Cool casts a blue hue and neutral is pretty good but noticeable darker so you end up trading off detail for color. I ended up using Cool the most because I wanted more brightness without losing detail in the super high contrast.- Room settings. There are 3 backlit levels on and easy button on the top left where you can select from DARK ROOM, MEDIUM, BRIGHT ROOM.  Bright room is the only setting that comes close to producing a real white and ends up being the best setting all the time. I tested the contrast/blooming issue with Medium thinking that may help but it didn't which tells me the contrast ratio spec is nothing but number when you can't use even a third of the contrast without losing details in the washout.The upside;- 1080p content looks amazing. The detail is better than any other set. I loaded up the Tron Legacy Blu-Ray to see how full HD content looked and found myself wondering if this is the same TV I was struggling with earlier in the day to find a good setting. The default GAME setting looked incredible with only needing a -1 or -2 nudge of brightness down and actually taking contrast up to 50% without losing any detail to blooming.  Blacks were black, dark greys were still detailed, and the colors jumped off the screen.It seems this display excels are displaying FULL HD content but struggles with processing compressed information (DirecTV and upscaled content). Some channels look phenomenal, some look crappy.  Live NBC broadcast of PGA Golf normally looks incredible on my Plasma, but on this set the color was way oversaturated (Tiger Wood's red golf polo looked like a big red blob with not fine detail of his shirt coming through) and no matter how much I turned down the color and contrast, it just has blooming issues even when the whites were looking gray from being turned down.  So my conclusion is while the tv may feel like a bargain for price/specs, it struggles to keep up with expectations unless you're going to just watch 1080p content.  It's not horrible, but you will certainly feel like you settled for a 2nd tier quality display after comparing it to the pricier alternatives if you look at it side by side.By ALL MEANS, do not use the SHOWROOM setting for watching satellite/cable.My takeaway is this is a learning experience.  I wondered if LED LCD displays had closed the gap on plasma and based on this, I don't think they have. Between black levels, white whites, and smooth color reproduction, plasma is still the champ in my book (and better for fast moving sports as even this 120hz has some noticeable blurring compared to 600hz plasma).  So for a secondary display with very little power consumption and long life expectation, it's good enough, but better suited for watching video games or Blu-Ray movies than anything else.  If I had a chance to do it over, I probably would go back and purchase a 42" 720p plasma closeout on sale.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TV FOR THE MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Rome
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to put in my bedroom, for streaming netflix and some light gaming! First westinghouse I've ever owned and I would defineitly purchase another one! Picture quality is stellar! Sound is great expecially in a larger room! I honestly cannot complain about this TV! You get 1080P, 120Hz for $369.99! Do not hesitate to jump on this deal I promise you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money!
Reviews.Author: G. A. Tabor "Interested Party"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after reading the feedback from other users.  After shopping around, it was clear that this was a good overall value when compared to other TV's especially smart TV's with embedded internet channel access.  For the money, with 120mhz refresh rates, this sounded like it was a great buy.I was concerned about reviews that indicated some owners had problems with their units soon after purchasing it, so bought the extended warranty to be safe and still paid less than comparable TV's from the likes of Sony, LG, etc.  We've had it installed for 3 months now and no issues.  The TV works great, provides excellent graphics, contrast, and color.  Still 33 months to go on the extended warranty so if something does go wrong, we're covered.  However, from the other writeups I'd seen, if you didn't have a problem soon after the purchase, you would most likely be fine so I'm not expecting anything else to go wrong.The TV generally has a very slim profile and looks really sharp.  I bought a square swivel wall mount for the TV as we mounted it in a corner and the standard square fittings didn't fit due to the way the back of the unit bumps out.  However, I was able to stack a couple of the spacers and bought 3 PVC fittings 1" diameter and 3/4" high and mounted the TV with these spacers in 3 corners between the bracket and the TV.  The screws were just long enough to reach so no other special fitting was required.  One corner fit tighter than the others and that's where I used the stacked spacers that came with the TV.  It worked perfectly and you can't see anything unusual so I'm happy with the way it worked out.  We're using HDTV from an Antenna and get 12 channels with 480-1080i/p quality and all look great.  We watched the Super Bowl on it and other athletic events and the graphics are super!  We're also using Hulu+ and Netflix which are fed from a Roku box!  It's working great!  Tied the sound into my stereo system and have excellent surround sound.We highly recommend this TV as a great buy for it's size.  If we eventually go larger in the family room, we'll move this to our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: very good looking tv
Reviews.Author: sheril
Reviews.Content: I really like the look of the tv and the sound quality for such a thin tv is very good. However i have not had for any period of time to give a well experience testimony but hope this help.

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: xdxbcooperx
Reviews.Content: What I wanted.  Cheap yet good.  No reason to spend way more and shipped for free.  I'm more than happy

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: D. J. Organ
Reviews.Content: Wanted a large screen for an exercise room, but didn't want to spend a lot.  Went with the "off brand" Westinghouse to get the largest screen for the money.  Very impressed with this TV.  I have it connected to Dish Network and BluRay, and with HD content it looks great.  Don't know about durability, but so far, I'm happy with the picture quality.  The features are somewhat limited, so if you have needs for advanced features, you will not be satisfied.  As a monitor for a few sources (sattelite, BluRay), it is a very capable product.

Reviews.Title: Black friday deal!
Reviews.Author: Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Got this on a black Friday deal. I was a little sketchy it being a Westinghouse and all so I frantically "googled" reviews for this product and found only a few negative reviews. I was impressed by the amount of positive reviews. So I bought it. I couldn't be more pleased with the decision. For the price, the quality of the picture and sound is great. I would totally recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: reinord roldan
Reviews.Author: reinord roldan
Reviews.Content: este equipo reune las condiciones exigidas por el comprador excelente equipo me gusta el tamaño y la versatildad del equipo

Reviews.Title: More than what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Hek
Reviews.Content: Oh my god! I had it shipped overnight, crazy, I know but when it arrived. I had it measured and it is 40 inches, no question about it yet it appear to be bigger. It's thin as heck and looks awesome even when I move around the room without the tinting. It was perfect! When I buy a bigger tv, it'll be by westinghouse, period.P.S. I was surprised at it's sleek design AND touchscreen power buttons!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Like the picture quality and sound, only dislike is not as many standard cord inputs for dvd player/gaming systems without using a converter box to HDMI cable to connect to the tv from my old 19" element tv. Otherwise highly satisfied with my westinghouse tv.

Reviews.Title: Really Great TV...Especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Apocynthion "Mll"
Reviews.Content: I, like most folks these days, am on a tight budget. Buying an item like a TV had to be researched enough in order to make sure I got the most bang for the buck (or my husband would have put the brakes on my shopping fun).With a simple, elegant design (if you will)  to this 40 inch display and awesome, even unheard of, stats ( LED 1080p 120HZ refresh rate HDTV) at a price I had to pinch myself to believe it wasn't a dream I scooped this TV up fast!It was delivered on time by a friendly, professional guy and it didn't have a bump or ding on it. It was easy to set up and the picture quality is rather awesome!Now, in searching all over Amazon.com and the web in general, I have found another Westinghouse TV with the same exact stats. However, it has a pretty crappy rating and review by a lot of customers. So check that this Model: UW40T2BW is the one you actually purchase if you choose to buy this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great looking TV, terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Love to read "Love to read"
Reviews.Content: I bought 39" westinghouse TV recently, mostly for its slim looks. Unlike some other posts, i was able to easily install the TV mounted on  the wall with a $29 device with no problems within 15 min. I kept this TV in my GYM room and did not have cable connection. So wanted to activate the antenna and that's where my troubles began to get an activation code (apparently this was needed to account for patent royalties). Sent SMS, and response came saying they do not support SMS. Sent email and no response. Went to web site for activation and they simply pointed to customer service number. Called customer service and the recording was a joke - it went into infinite loop.Waited till Monday and again retried the above sequence. Finally reached a customer service rep and she was rude saying i need to talk to activation department and hung up. after trying 15 minutes trying to reach them again i some how stumbled onto a web link and was able to get activation code from the web site (is the activation link only active on week days perhaps?).The whole process above left very bad taste, for otherwise what seems to be a good TV,  so far. Unfortunately i will not be buying westinghouse products again.

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Good Tv
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Morales "Waynetango"
Reviews.Content: I bought this during the cyber monday lightening deal. So far this has been a great television.  I haven't had any problems with this. I hooked up my blu-ray player and started watching movies right away.  I even started playing my xbox360 and i'm amazed on how totally different it looks to play games on a 40 inch flat screen compared to my old 22 inch television from 10 years ago(non flat). Great purchase for a great price.  If anything goes wrong i will update.OH and my son loves to watch his baby Einstein on it as well.

Reviews.Title: BEST TV compared with SAMSUNG & LG
Reviews.Author: dantheman
Reviews.Content: This TV picture is so CLEAR same as SAMSUNG or LG for mulch lesser price.  All you pay for is brand name with SAMSUNG OR LG.

Reviews.Title: Awesome, Don't be on the Fence!!
Reviews.Author: Beth Anne
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my son for Christmas.  I had never purchased a TV online before so I was a bit nervous.  But, with the price being so awesome and the delivery options for me because I am a Prime Member, I thought: What the heck, lets just give it a try.  The TV came packaged in the original box, so if you live in an area where you may be worried about someone seeing it sitting on your porch before you get home, I would recommend having it delivered to your back door or another option.  Back to the product:  It's an amazing TV!!  Clear picture, great sound!!!  My son is a Gamer so this TV is perfect for him.  The clarity of the visuals from The Call OF Duty Black Ops is amazing.If you are on the Fence about purchasing this TV, don't be,  It's an awesome TV, easy to set up, so easy a 16 year old can do it.So just buy it already!!!  :)

Reviews.Title: Very happy with image quality and prive
Reviews.Author: Jason L Hamilton
Reviews.Content: The colors and image quality look great out of the box, reasonably easy to set all the connections up.  I've been running it for a few months now and there have been no issues.  I've got it in an entertainment center (vs wall mounted), ports are pretty easy to access.  I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Gene jK
Reviews.Content: Purchased this television for son, he loves it.It has a great picture and the sound is superb.I highly recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: I am really in love with this TV
Reviews.Author: Emo
Reviews.Content: I replaced the first one that I've got, because it had some issues with the black. The new one arrived few day ago. Replacement was very easy to make. Great service from Amazon. The new one came just in 2 days. The TV looks great, fancy and even much more expensive. The picture quality is just perfect. I love it. I already recomended to my friends. Thanks a lot

Reviews.Title: Great TV -- especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: Deborah E. Majinska
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with the quality of our new Westinghouse TV.  It was shipped in a timely manner and was easy to set up.  Once we adjusted the color and brightness, we were impressed with both the picture and the sound.  A big thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Cheap & pretty HDTV not worth high failure risk and painful customer service
Reviews.Author: owen
Reviews.Content: Pros:Very good picture, good sound for a flat panel, and would be a great overall value for a 120Hz LED in this class if it worked reliablyCons:Error-prone buttons that render TV unusable, customer service lackingMy experience owning this TV:The TV has capacitive or electrostatic buttons on the bezel -- just labeled areas on the plastic that you touch, with no real borders or tactile response.  They are hard to see, annoying to use, and apparently prone to electrical problems.  Less than two months old, my TV started spontaneously activating menu options, changing the channel or volume at will, and even turning itself on in the middle of the night.The customer service process has been more painful than I would have believed possible.  I finally convinced Westinghouse to send a replacement 10 days after the TV became unusable; if their estimate for the replacement is correct, it will arrive between 19 and 26 calendar days after my new HDTV broke, between 12 and 19 calendar days after I FedExed back the broken one, and between 3 and 10 calendar days after the superbowl.Even at Black Friday prices, I wouldn't risk this model again -- Amazon returns are great, unless your flakey electronics manifest right after the return window closes!Review to be updated when the replacement arrives.

Reviews.Title: Great looking TV but problem with shutting off on its own, and poor mounting system.
Reviews.Author: Everplex Media LLC "Web Media & Design"
Reviews.Content: Before something fell into it today and it broke, it had a constant problem with shutting off, changing channels, switching input, pressing of volume and other buttons, all on its own. It was like it had a mind of its own. However, I discovered the reason is because the touch buttons are faulty, causing them to be pressed even though no one is pressing them.Other problem is the mounting system is non-standard, and NOT 200x200 vesa. Only way to make it fit was to drill holes in my wall mount, and even then it barely fit, and I had to drill more holes in the mount just to plug in the TV and the coaxial plug.Other than those two significant issues, the TV worked fine, although the audio sounded rather tinny.

Reviews.Title: Great Bang for the Buck, minus the sound
Reviews.Author: David Martin
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this TV, I have a smaller than average room and it fits beautifully. The picture for my movies and the shows I stream on Amazon are fantastic, plus the 120 hz makes the refresh rate fantastic for gaming.My only concern with it was the needed tweeking on the sound because certain dialouge for some shows and games would be very hard to hear without causing a complaint to a neighbor.Overall if you are looking for a college TV 40 inches or more and the 120hz for gaming, plus looking to spend under 400 dollars. You cannot do better than this. Take this advice from a college senior who wishes he bought this 3 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Ange
Reviews.Content: We got this TV on Cyber Monday; what a great TV for the price we paid. Super slim with a nice picture! As for the mounting... We bought a universal mount and had no problem mounting it... we didn't need to buy anything extra because all the screws and extenders came in the universal mount. Great TV... very happy!!!

Reviews.Title: Reviewers have it right. Great picture and more!
Reviews.Author: William Watson
Reviews.Content: I appreciate all the review comments.  Very helpful.  Now that we have owned this TV for a few weeks I agree that the picture is amazing.  The Wow: Worlds of Wonder Blueray from Disney is highly recommend to help calibrate.Pros:I found out of the box setup to be easy.  Using the cinema setting does provide a good picture if you don't want to play with the settings.I do find that the dynamic contrast ratio works well.  I read reviews for and against using this setting but on this TV it works well.  I prefer it.  It is off by default out of the box.Sound is good.The remote is simple but functional.Settings are basic but good enough.The picture is beautiful! People pop out of the screen.This TV with 120 Hz works so much better than the 60 Hz Samsung it replaced.  No more blurring during sports.Very thin and light TV.  As other reviewers have commented the build quality is excellent and the TV chassis makes it look like a much more expensive TV.Cons:This is why only 4 stars.  Our Comcast HD box has HD and non HD channels.  Sometimes when we change back and forth from HD to a non HD channel the TV gets confused and hangs up.  We have to shut the TV off and turn it on for it to reset. Annoying but we can go days between It happening. So considering how much we paid for the TV and we love the picture so much we will live with it.  Once more channels are HD it won't matter anyway.The TV is on a stand and not hanging up.  So I cannot comment on mounting to a wall.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michelle Campbell
Reviews.Content: This has been a great TV for us so far!  Easy to set up and easy to use.  The picture quality and sound quality are wonderful.  It was within our budget and we couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Didn't have some of the standard ports
Reviews.Author: D. Bogard
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents and they had a bit of a time getting it hooked up to their cable TV because the TV lacked the standard hook-up ports. The technician who came out said that it was designed more for institutional use.

Reviews.Title: I recommend to buy , If Ur not mounting on wall
Reviews.Author: Louis Fincham II
Reviews.Content: Great tv, great picture , easy to hook up & sound is good....But Im havingtrouble finding a mounting bracket for the wall..

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Desmond Jackson
Reviews.Content: Received on time and the picture is grey for the price. Would purchase again. Very thin product, would recommend to those interested in a great bargain.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Your Gaming needs
Reviews.Author: M. Baker
Reviews.Content: 40" of Gaming glory, This is a Good TV at a Very Good Price. 1080p and the 120hz refresh rate really make this worth it. No dead pixels whatsoever even though I haven't looked for any. I got this just so I could ditch my 32" 720p 60hz HDTV to something with a bit more PAZOW.Pros: Slim, 1080p (Perfect for Your Consoles), 120hz (Motion Blur cut in Half), 40" (Perfect size), Somewhat thin bezel, Under 400 dollars. (Taxes and Shipping will bring you up to 425+ dollars **Go Prime and get it shipped for free and in 2 days**)Cons: Funny Input placements (Hefty HDMI cables can be a tight fit), Limited Menu Options, Waiting for it to get to your house (More so if your tired of the TV you have right now.)I would more then likely recommend this to anyone looking to update and upgrade what they have, It is a good sized TV for Medium sized rooms, Large rooms may make this TV seem a bit small (Go for the 50"+ sizes)

Reviews.Title: Perfect in my game room
Reviews.Author: C. Butler
Reviews.Content: Got these tv on a lightning deal. I was skeptical buying a tv online but it shipped fast, no dents or damage to the box. Orginally has issues mounting it on the wall due to the recommended wall-mount was useless.

Reviews.Title: This has been a great TV so far
Reviews.Author: paulfj
Reviews.Content: I'm hesitant to review a TV after less than 2 months, but so far it's been great. As a disclaimer, my previous TV was a 32" standard def Panasonic. It was a good TV... 10 years ago when I bought it. The picture is clear, dark movies are much easier to view than my old TV. I think the sound is actually better as well. I still intend to purchase better speakers, but I can hear clearly sitting 16-18' from the TV. In fact, we now play radio off our iPhones via an Apple TV through this TV and it can be heard throughout the house (only about 1400 sq ft but still not bad sound).I did purchase a 3 year Square Trade warranty since this level of TV seems like if it's going to have a problem it occurs in the 1-3 year range. For $300, plus $40ish for the warranty, I'm happy knowing I have a great TV for the area for at least 3 years.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: edward ramos
Reviews.Content: the tv is really good, the image is cristal clear and the sound is very good, i will recomend this tv to everybody

Reviews.Title: Our own Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Judy Haggadone
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife wanted a bigger TV in our bedroom.  We shoped till we dropped..., comparing every possible feature such as 1080P 120Hz and LED. Let me be totally honest with you....!  This is our sixth (6) flat screen TV and of many different brands.  But this is a very great quality tv .....and th very best price, not to mention FREE Delivery.  ,; - )  Happy Camper here Mate

Reviews.Title: It's a TV
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Everything worked right out of the box. No hassles. All specs were met as described by the manufacturer. Worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Elliot
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV on black Friday 2012 for under $300 and so far am really pleased  with it. It was bought to replace an older tube TV that we have in our finished basement which is primarily used by our kids.TV was simple to set up and the picture quality is excellent. As others have reported,  the sound quality is not the best but certainly good enough for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Only one small problem
Reviews.Author: Steve A. Hayes
Reviews.Content: You have to get a code from Westinghouse to enter into TV to use it Free (over the air) and of course their center is only open during regular business hours so you're not going to set it up and use it on the weekend.  Once it is up and running, I couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Advertised incorrectly
Reviews.Author: M. Kamps
Reviews.Content: Pros:-Looks great-Cheap when I bought itCons:-Sound is just all right-The menu options are very limited compared to other HDTVs I've used-The HDMI ports are difficult to get to-Remote is not very responsive, has to be pointed DIRECTLY at the red lightThe worst part about this TV (so far) is that on Amazon it is advertised to have component inputs.  Which usually means YPbPr inputs.  It doesn't, though.  It has a VGA input.  I have an original Xbox 360 with no HDMI port.  What am I supposed to do with a VGA input?  That's just ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse Digital, LLC
Reviews.Author: Pam Wright
Reviews.Content: excellent quality - very pleasedpicture and sound is great - remotes are easy to usewish I had purchased this brand earlier

Reviews.Title: Great TV after some tweaking! suggested tweaks in comments
Reviews.Author: Koozi Guy "-Guy-"
Reviews.Content: This TV was EXACTLY what I was looking for. I'm a college student who has an unfortunately keen sense for audio-visual technology. No, this TV is not as exciting to watch as a $700 Samsung, but it is VERY comparable to the lower tier 40/42 inch LED tv's. I was EXTREMELY nervous before spending precious hundreds on this television, especially considering i could NOT find the exact model anywhere to test. I found similar ones at costco and bestbuy that had the same exact design, but different model numbers. They looked terrible compared to this. PS: save yourself $20 and order this "used- like new". the box was scratched up and damaged but the TV was absolutely brand new and immaculate-- amazon is very good about this.PICTURE QUALITY: SHARP, CRISP, BRIGHT AND CLEAR-- after some workThe picture did not disappoint. I use this TV primarily as a computer display (for netflix / my computer's blu-ray player). I also use it for my xbox. It only has two hdmi ports so this was fine. This TV works GREAT for computer; there's no overscan or anything. The picture gave me a heartattack because it looked TERRIBLE OUT OF THE BOX. i spent many hours fiddling with settings till i found something i like. The colors are clear and expressed well. Don't expect deep blacks from any LED TV. These are not any worse to my eyes than any other LED tv's i've seen. again, it took some tweaking to get a good balance of black. SPEND TIME. if i am convinced i've finally gotten the best possible picture, i'll post the settings.SOUNDI have a home theater system. I haven't heard it.LOCAL TV CONNECTIONI haven't tested this, but I plan too. I'll update later.APPEARANCEThin. Attractive enough. The frame just sort of naturally disappears from your vision and forces you to focus on the picture. Other tv's look very nice and glossy. This isn't beautiful like that, but it's certainly nice enough to blend in well with any decorative style.WHATS IN THE BOX?power cord, remote, TV, TV stand, manual

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: A. G. Perry
Reviews.Content: Great intro to high definition television. The colors pop, the blacks are deep, the sound is surprisingly good.Here are the few problems: there are only two HDMI inputs. The component video input is a VGA plug and separate audio input, so the standard five-RCA plug cord won't work here. So I had to get an HDMI switch in order to get my TiVo, Apple TV and DVD player all hooked up at once. It also has a composite input, but once you see the high def on here, its like watching television with a bag over your head.One other issue, the low profile of this Television means the remote receiver is very low. My old Westinghouse was fine, but now the receiver is hidden by my sound bar...But the only times i need to use it are to turn the TV on and off and switch inputs, so its not a big deal.This television is also not very big. Its nice to have a 40" screen and have the entire unit be less than 37 inches wide. Great for smallish rooms!

Reviews.Title: Good TV.
Reviews.Author: AJ Fleming
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV for the price. It has good color and brightness. I haven't tested the sound as I have a soundbar.The only thing I really dislike is the fact that it only has 2 HDMI ports. My audio system is a splitter so it's not a huge deal, but I could see this being frustrating for others.

Reviews.Title: High value performer
Reviews.Author: robert barth
Reviews.Content: It does in fact have a computer hook-up in spite of Westinghouse product description and the audio isn't noticeably different from any other mid-priced TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: JOSEPH E BRANNON
Reviews.Content: Bought this on a whim...wanted to replace a bedroom TV and loved it so much that I purchased 3 more different sizes for other rooms in the house...easy set up..nice clear picture...very happy with this TV..shipped very quickly..

Reviews.Title: nice for price
Reviews.Author: James R. Mccarter
Reviews.Content: great for my bed room wanted a T.V. that will not take up lots of room but looks good the sound is good and hanging it on the wall was not as bad as most say you will need 1'' spacers but after that it is good

Reviews.Title: totally worth the deal
Reviews.Author: ADY
Reviews.Content: really slim and cool TV to have. Its totally worth the price. Clarity, sound and colours are good. No cons faced till now

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse UW40T2BW 40 inch 1080p 120HZ Slim LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love this television. It was very easy to set up and program to our dish service. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a quality made product at a reasonable price.M. Brown

Reviews.Title: nice tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Guetter "mguetter"
Reviews.Content: nice tv easy to set up, great color and sound,, had to go on the web to get the code for my dish remote, but thats no big deal,,,, has far as mounting on the wall, make sure u got 1" spacers and u wont have a problem,,,,,for $299 u cant beat it!!!

Reviews.Title: Definitely good for the money
Reviews.Author: Devin Harpestad
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV for the price. I would have rather it had a swivel base and more than two HDMI ports.

Reviews.Title: Great Cyber Monday Deal
Reviews.Author: Meredith M. Smith
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have had the same 20" TV/DVD/VCR combo box since college.  We don't have cable or satellite but frequently use Netflix or similar on our pc.This year, we decided to finally get a new tv.  We set a price and specs, then said we would buy one as soon as a TV showed up meeting those requirements.  This TV met those with a lightening deal, and I was lucky.Easy to put together, very sleek looking.  We didn't do a wall mount.When viewing a full 1080p stream from Netflix or itunes (we got an Apple TV to go with it), this TV is IMO indistinguishable from the Samsung TVs we saw at the mall.  Lower quality streams look fine too, just not HD.  Sound is fine too.The interface on the TV is adequate, not fancy.  Cannot pull up a network TV guide like I could with my old CRT TV and converter box, but perhaps I haven't looked hard enough.  The remote is not great and requires a concentrated point at the TV, but no biggie since I typically use the Apple TV anyway, controlled with my iPhone.  I just use the TV remote for volume.So far, we are extremely happy with our purchase.  We paid a very low cyber Monday price, so this was a VERY good deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Charles E Willey
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this TV great deal for the price would be good for someone upgrading from the old tube style TV.This is replacing a Westinghouse monitor for my computer that is stilling going strong after 7 years.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: darthnater
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on a lightning deal on cyber Monday. I'm so impressed! At first I was a little weary because it wasn't a big name brand, but it's been great. The picture is great and the sound is adequate (I use a surround system most of the time so it doesn't matter much) I do see where it would be a pain to wall mount this TV, but if you can live without that its wonderful!

Reviews.Title: After a year of ownership
Reviews.Author: Tex
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for a little over a year. During that time; the remote died; then the TV would lose its memory when turned off, requiring you go through the setup process again; and finally the TV itself died needed replacing.During this period I contacted Westinghouse support online and directly by phone. Their support is one of the lousiest I have experienced. Their goal appears to be to get you off the phone or close the support ticket as quickly as possible without necessarily resolving the problem. Sometimes it would take a week to get a response to a support ticket, if you call them you'll be told someone will call you back, and they never do.In order to return the TV to be repaired, I had to send everything back, including the stand (so don't throw that away, even if you are wall mounting it). They will not cross ship a TV (even if you put a credit card number on file), so you'll need the box and be prepared to be without a TV for a while. Our repair (which ended up being a refurbished replacement TV) took just under 4 weeks (3 days shipping to them, 6 days from being signed for on their dock to being acknowledged as received by them, 2 weeks for the 'repair', and 3 days back to me). It could have taken longer had I not badgered their RMA team constantly to get the TV back ASAP.The bad:The VESA mounts require extended posts and bolts as they as set back about an inch from the back of the TV.If you remove the stand to wall mount the TV, then the power LED is not visible, The TV takes about 3 seconds to power on (it's like molasses) and you have no idea if the TV is starting up or it didn't get the remote signal.Very slow power up time, about 3 seconds before the "Westinghouse" logo appears.External power supply.Ugly remote.Poor reliability.Poor customer support.Slow repair/replacement processThe good:Picture is what you would expect for a TV at this price. If it is your first LED TV you'll love it,Inexpensive

Reviews.Title: Good deal on a 40
Reviews.Author: SSJEFF
Reviews.Content: I bought the Westinghouse UW40T2BW 40-Inch 1080p 120HZ Slim LED HDTV a couple weeks ago. It works ok. I have not figure out how to get the tuner working as I need a code. They offer three ways to get the code. I have tried the texting, but it has yet to give me the code. The Website shuffles me around. I bought the TV to mainly use with my XBOX streaming netflix and playing games and it works well for that. I do not use the speakers as I use my theater system for the sound.I have gotten around to mounting it on the wall and I find out the wall mounts on the TV are impossible with the kit I bought. The mounts are so close to the inner protruding part on the back that I will have to modify the mount on one side by drilling the holes out. The other side has the antenna/vga and other plug blocked by the mounting rail once installed. I am going to try and cut the mount out so it will work but it is going to be a pain.Update 22Jan2013I still have not been able to get the tuner programmed. I cannot get an answer from westinghouse. I ended up getting a TCL 55 and may put this in the garage or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great for the $
Reviews.Author: Mikel
Reviews.Content: Got it for $370ish.  At that kind of price, it's a great TV.  Up to $450 is still a solid deal, but as you get above mid-4s there are a lot more options at this size.Picture is great once you fiddle with the settings appropriately.  Easy setup, nothing glaring to dislike.  Have only watched a few BR discs and Streamed some movies through a Roku.I'll update if my opinion of anything changes since have only had it for 3 days so far.

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: BobMigs
Reviews.Content: Got this for our bedroom.  Put it up high on a shelf opposite our bed. That way we can comforably watch while already in bed.Good picture, good sound, good price.Arrived in 3 days.No issues.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: max
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a present for my husband.  He loves it.  He got to take the old one out to hte garage and put this nice new one in our bedroom

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL AT 299
Reviews.Author: ananth
Reviews.Content: pros -nice vivid picturegood sound by yamahaslim designthin brushed bezelcons -very basic remote featureswestinghouse customer serviceoverall it's an outstanding buy at 299

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Munir
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome TV, the menus are easy to use, the specs are great, and both the picture and sound are great.Can be used as a computer monitor well.Overall great TV especially for the low price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: MattTek
Reviews.Content: Impressive TV. Feels very solid and well built. It looks absolutely gorgeous. It's extremely thin, the edges around the screen are slim, and it has a very simple minimalist look. If you are looking for an inexpensive no-frills flat screen and are not going to wall mount it I recommend this TV, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Articulating Mount Directions and a slight review of the TV
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Let me say first off I think this is a great tv for the price or a few hundred more.  I agree with other reviewers stop here if you want 120Hz led.  I got this TV for our outdoor patio.  I blindly bought this mount http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001GTT0VO/ref=oh_details_o01_s00_i01 , which as I now, I know it does not fit.  I HAD to have an articulating mount because I have a need for multiple viewing areas.  Well I customized the mount.  Very simple now that you have someone to tell you the steps, if you have a drill and hacksaw :].I cut 4 - 3.5 inch long 1/4 aluminum plate, It was 2 inches wide.  I then drilled 2 - 1/4 inch holes exactly 2 inches apart at dead center of the holes.  I then affixes those pieces to the mount with small 1/2 inch nuts and bolts, with the nuts closest to the wall.  I also had those custom plates on the side of the mount that was closest to the wall.  I then bought 4 m6 screws that were about 1.5 inches long, along with 4 - 1 inch plastic spacers and mounted the TV with the help of my wife and child. This took about hour from start to finish after I had the parts.Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture (120hz, 1080p)
Reviews.Author: Consumer
Reviews.Content: Hands down, for the price this is will be a great purchase! Beautiful picture for movies, PC, ect.... I bought this tv primarily for gaming and i have no complains at all!!!!! I know looking at the TV/Brand online you probably thinking, "should I?" WELL YOU SHOULD IF YOU WANT TO SAVE MONEY ON BUYING A BRAND NAME TV THAT HAS GREAT QUALITY AS THE Westinghouse UW40T2BW 40-Inch 1080p 120HZ Slim LED HDTV!Pros: Excellent Picture, 120HZ, Slim Design, and its AFFORDABLE!!!!Cons: No Composite Input, and flimsy stand (but still quite sturdy)

Reviews.Title: Great Screen!
Reviews.Author: driskell
Reviews.Content: Love the screen.  Makes normal tv look lots better.  DVD's are wonderful.  Video games are so radically sick and crisp and clear.  Sound is decent for the rear facing speaker.  Out of the box am very pleased.  Didn't even try the wall mount, because of other reviews.  Besides, we move stuff around in our living room too much anyway to wall mount it.  So I didn't have the tough issues that other people had.  Get a sound bar of some kind for improved blasting sound for movies.  Great tv.  Standard features for a tv.  Friendly enough remote.  Nice basic television.  Update review in a month to see if any other issues apply.

Reviews.Title: High End TV, Low End Pricing
Reviews.Author: K. Litchholt
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV as a lightning deal for $299 and could not be happier.  This TV replaced my primary aging 42in Vizio Plasma (720p) tv.  I have always taken a chance with lesser known brands, as with enough research and comparison you will find that most can compare with higher end models.Pros:Easy SetupPicture (1080P looks stunning)Design (Thin sleek bezel, with non intrusive company logo.  Does not look like a knockoff TV)Cons:Tuner - Didnt have any issues with the activation procedures, nor did that bother me; however channels frequently display the channel issue when the selected station alters their resolution.  For instance going from a High Def football game to a low-def commercial causes the channel information to be displayed in the top right.  This could be an issue with some local channels, as this was not experienced on all channels.Picture - The picture overall was stunning, but out of the box the brightness was a little dull to my taste.  Utilizing a THX optimization disk I was able to tweak the brightness / contrast with no issues.  Out of the box the brightness was set to low and the contrast was set to high.  I also preferred the color temperature to be set to cool instead of warm.  I highly recommend that anyone who complains of the picture settings to utilize a optimization dvd when calibrating their tv.Lack of inputs - TV only has two HDMI inputs, which isnt a huge deal.  There is no component inputs.Variable Audio / Video out - I do not utilize the internal speakers, as with any TV especially the real thin ones its near impossible to put good speakers inside a confined space.  What I found is that the audio/video out utilizing the old RCA cables (white / red) is controlled directly by the volume on the TV.  When I first hooked up the surround sound I had to turn it all the way up for it to even be at a comfortable level, so I figured something wasn't right.  Its always recommended you turn off the internal speakers, which this TV does have that feature; however when the internal speakers are off the TV volume in un-adjustable.  The solution to this issue was to turn to something with no sound.  Crank the volume all the way up and then disable / turn off the internal speaker.

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse 40 in led 120hz hdtv
Reviews.Author: MatthewHawk
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing hdtv.  I purchased this with an amazon hdmi cable, and the picture quality is stunning.  This tv is great for playing video games, watching blu-ray, and cable in hd.  Also another amazing thing is the price, u won't find a led120hz tv for under 600$.  All in all would recommend a westinghouse to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic buy at $299.00
Reviews.Author: elvisat1000ft
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tv. My only compaint is that I cannot program the tv to work with a different remote control.

Reviews.Title: How do I give it 0 Stars? On my THIRD Replacement in 8 months!!!
Reviews.Author: CP
Reviews.Content: Well, after buying a Westinghouse 40' LED 8 months ago, I am now on my SECOND REPLACEMENT tv under their "warranty" and this time they sent me a brand new one (not refurbished). Plugged it in and all I got was a distorted picture and red squiggly lines across it (in every mode).The first time my original Westinghouse went out was 4 months after I bought it...couldn't return it cause it was past the return date at target so I had to PAY $ 40 to SHIP IT BACK to Westinghouse (their warranty does not cover shipping and there are no repair facilities you are allowed to take it to). Luckily I had a box or I would have been out another $20 buying a large box to put it in (since I stupidly trusted that I had a reliable tv and threw away the box)!That replacement tv lasted 1 month before it stopped turning on. This time I kept the box and this time they PAID for me to send it back (how nice of them..NOT!)So they just shipped me my THIRD tv and now that doesn't work from the moment I plugged it in..Tried to get my money back cause I am sick of packaging this up and dropping it off to be shipped, being without a tv for weeks while they "process" the order" and then getting another tv that is junk. Sorry, they don't do refunds even if you are now returning your THIRD tv!!!!I have owned lots of different brands of tvs and never have I encountered such junk!Don't buy this...you will be throwing your money away!!!

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Kevin Alleyne
Reviews.Content: Not sure if I got a defective one, but it would constantly need to be reconnected to the HDMI source from the cable box. The volume would just automatically go up occasionally and the menu prompts would keep appearing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: ShowMeStateMan
Reviews.Content: Picked up at Target for 199 on Black Friday (Target SKU was different#), this set is excellent in it's picture quality. Pick up a Sony soundbar for under $100 on sale and you are good to go. This for our size family room fit the bill and with the Sony soundbar and subwoofer, we feel like we are at the movies....Get it!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, good sound, good looking, just a very good buy :-}
Reviews.Author: fellowhawk
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv at Kmart the other day for $219.00. Was going to by a 32", but notice this tv was bigger and a better buy.I was very impressed, sound is good on it's own and the picture is very good, seriously to many people are being to picky over things. I got a heck of a deal and even had money left to buy another 24" tv. For the price and quality, this is a very good tv, gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: A nice suprise
Reviews.Author: dannymike
Reviews.Content: In the rush to push out televisions that are bigger, smarter, guzillion ppi; those of us that just want to watch tv are getting lost.  This Westinghouse has simple controls, thank heavens, and a crisp, rich picture.  The price was very economical.Want to watch TV?  This ain't a bad choice.

Reviews.Content: wonderful, best thing yet....great, you are so beautiful.....can't wait to buy something else. ha!  please, stop requesting so much information.

Reviews.Title: Can't program universal remote
Reviews.Author: Oofah32
Reviews.Content: Just bought this for dad.  He needs one remote; he can't handle two remotes.  I tried everything to program the Time Warner remote, but it won't take.  It's going back.

Reviews.Title: Incorrect dimensions
Reviews.Author: Robert Stafford
Reviews.Content: The dimensions given in the product details are incorrect, in order for the length and width given to be correct the TV would have to measure over 51 inches diagonally according to basic pythagorean theorem (A squared plus B squared equals C squared).  Now I know that 40 inches is only the screen size but I seriously doubt the border is 11 inches long at the corner.

Reviews.Content: Just bought this TV at Costco for $369.00.  Plus extra 3 yr. warranty for $29.99., and Costco gives a 2 yr. warranty with all their TV"S
